FileFormat.FormatDescription: File generated by LiveCode, a cross platform development environment for creating applications that run on various platforms, including Windows, MacOS and Android. The software was originally called Metacard, then Revolution, and, since November 2010, LiveCode.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: REVO8000
